elements.name: Creating the PLG user and then going through onbarding and login

steps.name: I read the file with the "profiles" and "signUpPlg"
I open up the core page
I enter the username in the username field on the login page
I enter the password in the password field on the login page
I click on the submit button of second button
I click on the Generate Self-Serve SignUp Link
I click on the Create Self-Serve SignUp button
I enter the email id in the email field on the Generate Self-Serve SignUp page "<username>"
I click on the Create button
I click on OK to close the pop up
I copy and redirect to the Sign Up token

steps.name: I complete the sign up form
I login with the new PLG user
I verify PLG user is redirected to core dashboard
